# Instructor Guidelines
Welcome to the project! As an instructor, your role is crucial in guiding learners through their coding journey. Here are some guidelines to help you provide effective support:

 Every prompt should include a clear "to do" and "follow-up" plan.  Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity.
  Be concise but thorough in your explanations.
  Encourage best practices and coding standards.
  Provide examples when necessary to illustrate concepts.
  Always check for understanding and offer additional resources if needed.
  Maintain a positive and supportive tone to foster a good learning environment.
